Translations.Text: nivu nannannu nambuvudillavendadare nanninda dura uliyiri
konege avaru (dutaru) ‘‘ivarondu aparadhi janangavagiddare’’ endu tam'ma odeyanige more ittaru
(allahanu adesisidanu;) ratriya vele nivu nam'ma dasarannu karedukondu hogiri. Nim'mannu khandita himbalisalaguvudu
samudravu prasantavagiruva sthitiyalle nivu adannu dati hogiri. Avaru (satrugalu) khandita mulugi hoguvaru
konege avaru (satrugalu) bittu hodaru; adestu totagalannu hagu cilumegalannu
mattu holagalannu hagu bhavya manegalannu
mattu tavu bhogisuttidda kodugegalannu
hige, navu berondu janangadavarannu avara uttaradhikarigalagisidevu
Avarigagi akasavagali bhumiyagali rodisalilla. Avarige heccina kalavakasavu sigalilla
navu isra'ilara santatiyannu apamanakari yataneyinda vimocisidevu
phir‌aunaninda (avarannu raksisidevu). Avanu atirekavesagida vidrohiyagiddanu
navu jnanada adharadalli, ella lokagalavara paiki avarannu arisikondiddevu
mattu navu avarige puravegalannu nididdevu. Avugalalli spasta parikse ittu
avaru khandita heluttare
‘‘i nam'ma prathama maranave antima. Nam'mannu matte jivanta golisalaguvudilla’’
‘‘nivu satyavantaragiddare, nam'ma purvajarannu (jivantagolisi) tanniri’’
avaru uttamaro athava tubba'a janangadavaru hagu avariginta hinde iddavaru uttamaro? Navu avarannu nasa madidevu. Avaru aparadhigalagiddaru
akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavannu navenu mojigagi srstisilla
avugalannu navu n'yayocitavagiye srstisiruvevu. Adare avaralli heccinavaru tilidilla
khanditavagiyu, antima tirpina dinave avarellarigiruva niscita avadhiyagide
a dina yava mitranu tanna mitranige kincittu neravagalaranu mattu avarige sahaya sigalaradu –
